document.full_text: british music and tv mogul simon cowell has been pushing for cheryl cole to be chosen as a judge on the upcoming u.s. launch of talent show "the x factor," despite reports she had been ditched, his publicist said.
document.title: cowell still in talks over u.s. "x factor" judges
lines_and_colors: british music and tv mogul simon cowell has been pushing for cheryl cole to be chosen as a judge on the upcoming u.s. launch of talent show "the x factor," despite reports she had been ditched, his publicist said.
